title: FREE Riot Points Hack!!!

embed.description: Pro-tip: Don't trust messages or links to sites promising to give you free RP! Join RHrealism and Crazy Boris in this important PSA to educate yourself on how to protect your League of Legends account. And remember, if you lose access to your account or have other questions, be sure to visit https://support.riotgames.com so we can help you out!

body:
Confirmed, I only needed to give up my password and I got free riot points!

Upvote so others can see this Exploit riot doesn't know about!

replies.body: TRIST DUMB THICC
If you think tristana is **T H I C C**, i'd love to hear your opinion of fiddlesticks
That one is simple. Fiddle is all **S T I C K**.
S T I C C*

I stand - sorry, _sit_, corrected.

_Thought about "sticc", but decided "stick" would be more meme'esque since he's called "Fiddlesticks"._

Fiddlessticks
Is one sticc bih
lemme
see that fussy.

Well, if I were you, I wouldn't want to come too close to that fussy with any needlessly large rod, else running the risk of catching spliters.

_I wouldn't trust that **S T I C C** at all to keep dat snatch well oiled and polished._

>TRIST DUMB **C H I C C**

FTFY.

http://img06.deviantart.net/0de1/i/2012/240/e/8/lol___evening_at_the_jungle_cafe_by_ffsade-d5crpga.jpg

Typical Ww - he's done it before.

http://68.media.tumblr.com/26e38a57ba3cd62fc9da6eaf04f6aa2b/tumblr_o8o8koIbQV1qhttpto1_1280.jpg

--------

["If something seems too good to be true"](http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SnuJRNZ-lVY/T7vH-BUPmII/AAAAAAAAAfM/yWO4FqNNaoo/s300/LOL_300x250_a.jpg)...

http://www.blogcdn.com/blog.games.com/media/2011/08/penny-arcade-free-games.jpg
Wait why would Warwick need a knife?
To cut out her heart, I presume.
Rip old lore
Yup.
But he's got claws, and fangs. Are they really that dull?

Precision. Fangs are definitely a no-no for open-heart surgery, and claws... well, it depends on the claws. Claws are piercing and tearing tools, not clean cut tools. He could certainly just tear it out, but it depends on the condition of the heart required and risky it'd be if he didn't do a clean tear. Sometimes, it's best to be cautious.

I promise I have never murdered anyone, just to clarify.

I understand that claws and teeth don't make clean cuts but if he needed the heart in tact I don't think the knife above would be a great choice. Also his old lore never really mentioned how intact it needed to be.
I mean, Warwick got ok cheeks, but how'd he regrow his arm?
So that's how he killed Urf
Urf's weakness was free RP? Who knew!?

Urf...really putting the RP in RIP.

_Now it all becomes clear._
I actually fell for this once -_-'' It was a friend that I trusted :( I had to change my password after that.
https://68.media.tumblr.com/b51a2ebb26599ddd8e90b51561fc7e09/tumblr_n1ct0tUNKy1qzqo6eo1_500.gif
Poor Warwick, he's the black sheep of league now
people who fall for this deserve to lose their account and should be prevented from making another one as punishment
League would lose 70% of their population and the game would slowly die.
Yep I'd be down for losing all the people that make this game dog shit, smaller community games are usually more pleasant
Then you're simply playing the wrong game. League of Legends is a giant. There are many smaller MOBAs, why play the biggest one and hope for it to shrink?

Just like it was, back when it was Rito Gems (and not Tencent), and this was a game "by gamers, for gamers" - and not controlled by LC$ and a money-milking corporation.

I miss those days.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BZImEUql,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-16T13:59:09.443+0000)
>
> Just like it was, back when it was Rito Gems (and not Tencent), and this was a game "by gamers, for gamers" - and not controlled by LC$ and a money-milking corporation.
> 
> I miss those days.

Tencent was involved in Riot as early as 2008 by providing the latter with funds. Tencent then bought out a majority of Riot's shares in early 2011, ie at the start of Season 1, officially owning Riot since then.

So if anything's changed, it's Riot themselves.

I'm a simple man
I see Poppy, I upvote

But Poppy should've been the one to be fooled tho

I know that - this is M&G, so I didn't downvote.

Figured I'd just play on what you said, proving the actual point of the joke in a funny way.

penpals?
